title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Explanation (2 points)

· Protein A and Protein B have the same intracellular domain/section 5 is the same.

· Protein A and Protein B activate the same signal transduction pathway/second messenger.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Prediction (1 point)

· No change

Justification (1 point)

· The intron is removed.

· The intron does not contain protein-coding information.

· The intron is not translated.
